title: Been seeing gold players occasionally over the last few normal games...
body:
They are, every single one, the most arrogant, abusive pieces of shit I have had the misfortune of being put up against in a long while. 

Are all gold players like this?

replies.body: people who pay money irl for people to boost their account one division higher then boast about it are pathetic excuses for an existence
yes, but only when we stomp bads.
jsut add them to your ignore list, takes 2 seconds
All golds who still play with mostly silvers are, they think that because they're 1 division higher they can do what they want lol
